snippet: Chris Kyle, a former Navy SEAL, had taken a troubled fellow veteran to a gun range for a kind of therapy session, but the police said the man turned his gun on Mr. Kyle.
abstract: Former Navy SEAL and best-selling author Chris Kyle, who survived four tours in Iraq, is shot and killed by Eddie Ray Routh, troubled fellow veteran he took to Texas gun range for a kind of therapy session.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ
byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez reported from Houston, and Michael Schwirtz from New York. Julie Bosman contributed reporting from New York, and Thom Shanker from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Chris Kyle, a former Navy SEAL, had taken a troubled fellow veteran to a gun range for a kind of therapy session, but the police said the man turned his gun on Mr. Kyle.

headline.seo: Chris Kyle, Author of ‘American Sniper’ Reported Killed in Texas
headline.main: Untouchable in Iraq, Ex-Sniper Dies in a Shooting Back Home
headline.print_headline: Untouchable in Iraq, Ex-Sniper Dies in a Shooting Back Home

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: American Sniper: The Autobiography of the Most Lethal Sniper in U.S. Military History (Book)
